required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Copper and Molybdenum Balance in Participants With Wilson Disease Treated With ALXN1840
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase 2, Open-label Study to Assess Copper and Molybdenum Balance in Participants With Wilson Disease Treated With ALXN1840

brief_summary.textblock: This exploratory study will investigate the effects of ALXN1840 on copper balance in participants with Wilson disease (WD).

detailed_description.textblock:
Participants who are treatment experienced (which includes standard-of-care therapies or ALXN1840) and treatment naïve are eligible for this study.
Safety will be monitored throughout the study.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Accumulation: Day 1 through Day 8 (ALXN1840 15 mg) and Day 31 through Day 35 (ALXN1840 30 mg); Steady state: Day 25 through Day 28 (ALXN1840 15 mg) and Day 36 through Day 39 (ALXN1840 30 mg)
primary_outcome.description: Copper balance is defined as the difference between the measured copper input in food and drink, and the measured copper elimination in urine and feces, and will be calculated as the average daily copper balance over the collection period.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change From Baseline In Mean Daily Copper Balance
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Accumulation: Baseline, Day 1 through Day 8 (ALXN1840 15 mg) and Day 31 through Day 35 (ALXN1840 30 mg); Steady State: Baseline, Day 25 through Day 28 (ALXN1840 15 mg) and Day 31 through Day 39 (ALXN1840 30 mg)
secondary_outcome.description: Copper balance is defined as the difference between the measured copper input in food and drink, and the measured copper elimination in urine and feces, and will be calculated as the average daily copper balance over the collection period.

secondary_outcome.measure: Copper Quantified In Food, Drink, Feces, And Urine, Including Plasma Total And Labile Bound copper (LBC)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Accumulation: Day 1 through Day 8 for 15 mg and Day 31 through Day 35 for 30 mg; Steady state: Day 25 through Day 28 for ALXN1840 15 mg and Day 36 through Day 39 for ALXN1840 30 mg
secondary_outcome.description: Copper will be assessed through measurement of copper intake (in food and drink), and copper output (in feces and urine) as well as plasma total and labile bound copper.

secondary_outcome.measure: Molybdenum Specified In ALXN1840 Doses Given And Quantified In Food, Drink, Feces, And Urine, Including Plasma At Steady State
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 25 through Day 28 (ALXN1840 15 mg) and Day 36 through Day 39 (ALXN1840 30 mg)
secondary_outcome.description: Molybdenum balance is defined as the difference between the measured molybdenum intake (in food, drink, and ALXN1840), and molybdenum output (in feces and urine), and will be calculated as the average daily molybdenum balance over the collection period.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change From Baseline In Total Molybdenum Excretion In Urine And Feces
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Accumulation: Baseline, Day 1 through Day 8 (ALXN1840 15 mg) and Day 31 through Day 35 (ALXN1840 30 mg); Steady State: Baseline, Day 25 through Day 28 (ALXN1840 15 mg) and Day 36 through Day 39 (ALXN1840 30 mg)

secondary_outcome.measure: Mean Daily Molybdenum Balance At Steady State
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Steady state: Day 25 through Day 28 (ALXN1840 15 mg) and Day 36 through Day 39 (ALXN1840 30 mg)
secondary_outcome.description: Molybdenum balance at steady state will be assessed through measurement of molybdenum intake (in food, drink, and ALXN1840), and molybdenum output (in feces and urine). Steady state is defined as molybdenum(out) equal to molybdenum(in).

secondary_outcome.measure: Accumulation Of Molybdenum As Determined By Molybdenum Balance
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Accumulation: Day 1 through Day 8 for 15 mg and Day 31 through Day 35 for 30 mg
secondary_outcome.description: Molybdenum balance will be assessed through measurement of molybdenum intake (in food, drink, and ALXN1840), and molybdenum output (in feces and urine).

arm_group.description: Participants will be administered ALXN1840 at a dose of 15 milligrams (mg)/day on Day 1 through Day 28 and then increased to 30 mg/day on Day 29 through Day 39

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
1. Diagnosis of WD by Leipzig Criteria > 4.
2. Able to reside in the clinical research unit for intensive metabolic monitoring of copper and molybdenum.
3. Participants willing to adhere to copper/molybdenum-controlled diet during the study.
4. Willing and able to follow protocol-specified contraception requirements.
5. Capable of giving signed informed consent.
Exclusion Criteria:
1. Decompensated cirrhosis or model for end stage liver disease score > 13.
2. Modified Nazer score > 7.
3. Clinically significant gastrointestinal bleed within past 3 months.
4. Alanine aminotransferase > 2 × upper limit of normal.
5. Hemoglobin less than lower limit of the reference range for age and sex.
6. Significant medical history (current or past).
7. Previous treatment with zinc within 30 days prior to the Screening Visit.
8. Participants in renal failure, defined as in end-stage renal disease on dialysis (chronic kidney disease stage 5) or creatinine clearance < 30 milliliters/minute.
